name: split: minimalist puzzle
description:
split

(by Gorefactory)

"Note : The game was created in 48 hours for GMTK2020"

Split is a 2D minimalist abstract game where players movement switch on collision. Focus your sense as the level is divided into 3 parts that only show a specifics . Making it out of player control to keep track of the level.

what to expect?
  • A mini game with minor bugs.
  • Up to 5 unique levels .
  • Flat design.
  • Requires practice and eye-hand coordination. 

Thanks,

Gorefactory.
